name: Passenger Elevators
title: Professional Passenger Elevator Systems
shortDesc: Safe and comfortable elevators for residential and commercial buildings
overview: CastleElevator passenger elevators are engineered for comfort, safety, and efficiency. Perfect for residential apartments, office buildings, hotels, and shopping centers. Our systems feature advanced control technology, smooth acceleration, and exceptional reliability. Experience world-class elevator service with modern amenities and emergency backup systems.

specifications.doors: Automatic sliding doors with safety sensors

warranty: Comprehensive 5-year warranty covering all parts and labor with annual maintenance service included.
maintenance: Professional maintenance teams available 24/7 for emergency support and preventive care. Quarterly inspections and annual overhauls included.

name: Freight Elevators
title: Heavy-Duty Freight Elevator Systems
shortDesc: Industrial-grade elevators for heavy loads and goods transportation
overview: CastleElevator freight elevators are built for demanding industrial environments. With capacities up to 5000 kg, they handle everything from factory goods to construction materials. Designed for continuous operation with reinforced steel construction and industrial-grade components. Perfect for factories, warehouses, shopping centers, and commercial complexes.
warranty: Comprehensive 5-year warranty with quarterly maintenance and 24-hour support.
maintenance: Industrial maintenance program with preventive care, regular inspections, and immediate emergency response available.

name: Home Elevators
title: Residential Home Elevator Solutions
shortDesc: Compact and stylish elevators for residential properties and luxury homes
overview: CastleElevator home elevators bring luxury and convenience to your residence. These compact, energy-efficient systems are designed to blend seamlessly with modern home architecture. Perfect for multi-story homes, villas, and luxury properties. Features whisper-quiet operation, elegant cabin designs, and advanced safety systems suitable for family use.

specifications.doors: Automatic sliding doors with safety features

warranty: Comprehensive 5-year residential warranty with annual maintenance visits included.
maintenance: Annual maintenance with quarterly optional service checks. 24/7 emergency support for residential customers.

name: Hospital Elevators
title: Specialized Medical Elevator Solutions
shortDesc: Specialized elevators for hospitals with stretcher and equipment transport capabilities
overview: CastleElevator hospital elevators are engineered specifically for medical environments. With wider cabins, reinforced safety features, and touch-free controls, they safely transport patients, medical equipment, and stretchers. Features antimicrobial surfaces, emergency backup systems, and 24/7 support for healthcare facilities.

specifications.speed: Up to 2.5 m/s (smooth for patient comfort)
specifications.doors: Automatic sliding doors with sensors (touch-free option)
specifications.width: Wider cabin design for stretcher accessibility
specifications.safety: Hospital-grade safety systems with backup power

features: Wide cabin for stretcher and equipment transport
Quiet, smooth operation for patient comfort
benefits: Safe transport for patients and medical equipment
Reduces infection risk with antimicrobial design
warranty: Comprehensive 5-year medical facility warranty with priority maintenance included.
maintenance: Dedicated medical facility support with 24/7 emergency response and quarterly inspections standard.

name: Hydraulic Elevators
title: Reliable Hydraulic Elevator Systems
shortDesc: Durable hydraulic elevators for low to mid-rise buildings with superior reliability
overview: CastleElevator hydraulic elevators combine simplicity with reliability. Perfect for low to mid-rise buildings (up to 10 floors), these systems offer smooth operation, minimal maintenance, and cost-effectiveness. Ideal for residential apartments, office buildings, and commercial establishments. Features proven hydraulic technology with modern controls and emergency systems.
warranty: 5-year comprehensive warranty with quarterly maintenance included.
maintenance: Simple hydraulic system maintenance with quarterly inspections and yearly overhauls.

name: Automatic Car Lifts
title: Multi-Level Vehicle Parking Solutions
shortDesc: Smart car lift systems for multi-level parking with automated controls and safety features
overview: CastleElevator car lifts provide efficient multi-level vehicle parking solutions for commercial and residential complexes. With automated controls, advanced safety features, and space-efficient design, they maximize parking capacity in minimal space. Perfect for parking garages, hotels, shopping malls, and residential buildings. Features smooth operation, safety interlocks, and weather-resistant construction.

specifications.capacity: 3000-5000 kg per vehicle (supports all car types)
specifications.space: Up to 300% increase in parking capacity
specifications.power: Low power consumption with backup systems

warranty: 5-year comprehensive warranty on all mechanical and electrical components.
maintenance: Professional maintenance with quarterly inspections, annual overhauls, and 24/7 emergency support.

name: Modern Escalators
title: High-Capacity Escalator Systems
shortDesc: Heavy-duty escalators for shopping centers, airports, and transit stations
overview: CastleElevator escalators are engineered for continuous operation in high-traffic environments. With state-of-the-art safety systems and energy-efficient design, they handle thousands of passengers daily. Ideal for shopping centers, airports, train stations, hospitals, and entertainment venues. Features advanced control systems, automatic load balancing, and eco-friendly energy management.
warranty: 5-year comprehensive warranty with quarterly maintenance and 24/7 support included.
maintenance: Professional maintenance contracts with emergency response, preventive care, and automatic parts management.

name: Dumbwaiters
title: Compact Dumbwaiter Service Systems
shortDesc: Small-scale lifts for restaurants, hotels, offices, and residential use
overview: CastleElevator dumbwaiters are designed for efficient transportation of small goods, documents, and light materials between floors. Perfect for restaurants, hotels, hospitals, offices, and residential properties. Our compact systems require minimal space while offering maximum reliability. Features quiet operation, easy installation, and low maintenance requirements.

specifications.installation: Easy installation with minimal structural changes

warranty: 5-year warranty covering all parts and service for residential use.
maintenance: Annual maintenance with optional quarterly checks. Quick response emergency support available.
